messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Screen Time for Children, And Harry Potter Headac...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/31/03 04:03:39 PM Central Standard Time, Dnowens@aol.com writes: If you thought your kids were spending too much time in front of the TV
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/31/03 04:03:39 PM Central Standard Time,
Dnowens@... writes:
If you thought your kids were spending too much time in front of the TV and
video games, then watch out for Harry Potter! It's a headache epidemic! (Well
only an epidemic if you consider one doctor and three kids an epidemic.
<beg>)
Daily Times - Site Edition

~Nancy ;o)

That link didn't come through, I'll try again. I use google news, so if the
link doesn't come through again, you could go there. Irish Examiner> Breaking
News> Potter fans suffering 'Hogwarts headaches' or Brudirect.com - World
Report Special
